title: SAMSUNG Galaxy F23 5G (Forest Green, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Data Cable (USB Type C-to-C), Sim Ejection Pin, Quick Start Guide
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Camera Setup: 50MP + 8MP + 2MP, Camera Feature: AR Zone, Bixby Vision, Food, Hyperlapse, Macro, Night, Panorama, Photo, Portrait, Pro, Pro Video, Scene Optimizer, Single Take, Slow Motion, Super Slow-Mo, Video
product_specification.Sensors: Accelerometer, Fingerprint Sensor, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor, Virtual Proximity Sensing
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty Provided by the Manufacturer from Date of Purchase

product_description.Unrivalled Speed: Featuring a Qualcomm Snapdragon 750G processor, the Galaxy F23 5G is a unique smartphone that enables you to play games with negligible latency and multitask with numerous applications, thereby amplifying your efficiency.
product_description.Enthralling Performance: Galaxy F23 5G employs a unique feature that converts internal storage as a virtual RAM that is extendable up to 12 GB. This enables you to game, stream movies, or easily connect while traveling.
product_description.Powerful Cooling: The Galaxy F23 5G sports a Power Cool technology that enables your phone to perform well even when exposed to demanding activities for extended hours of time without overheating.
product_description.Supreme Smoothness: The Samsung Galaxy F23 5G has a blazing-fast refresh rate of 120 Hz, ensuring a seamless and flawless user experience. The Gorilla Glass 5 display provides an extra layer of sturdiness. Furthermore, the attractive16.72 cm (6.6) Full HD+ Infinity-U Display provides a panoramic visual experience.
product_description.Incredible Clarity: The Galaxy F23 5G's unique Voice Focus function cancels out the background noise and enhances your voice, delivering precise voice clarity even with a lot of disturbance in the surroundings.
product_description.Hassle-free Connectivity: This smartphone comes with an Auto Data Switch feature that facilitates an automatic switch over to your secondary SIM when the primary SIM loses its network to ensure that you remain connected no matter where you are.
product_description.Fascinating Imagery: This phone comes with a breath-taking 50 MP triple camera with a 123-degree ultra-wide field of vision that is capable of capturing stunning pictures with astonishing imagery.
product_description.5G Support: With Galaxy 5G-12 Bands support, you can download, upload, stream, and share your favourite content anytime and anywhere at lightning speed.
product_description.Unmatched Power: With a 5000 mAh battery that features a 25 W fast charging support, you can go on and on about playing games and enjoying your movie marathon without having to worry about charging your phone frequently. Furthermore, this phone comes with a Type-C to Type-C cord that is environment-friendly paving the way for sustainable living.
product_description.Astonishing Design: The Galaxy F23 5G smartphone is sure to mesmerise you with an appearance that is fascinating and eye-catchy. With two colour variants and an attractive matte finish, this phone gets you to the spotlight wherever you go.

review:
Review After Using 5 Days:

1. SD 750 works very well and give a very good performance
2. Fingerprint Sensor is very quick and responsive
3. Camera is not up to the mark. Many other devices in the same range perform very well comparatively.
4. Charing adapter not provided in the box. Gives a bad impression. Although the device supports 25W. See below the charging speed analysis.
5. Samsung Keyboard's haptic feedback is awesome. I have not tried any other keyboard.
6. Knox security present
7. Display is decent. But the 120Hz refresh rate lags sometimes. Sometimes it's buttery smooth, sometimes it's not.
8. One UI 4.1 and Android 12 out of the box, which is impressive.
9. Battery backup is decent enough for entire day usage.
10. RAM management is decent so far.
11. Sound quality is pretty decent. Better than many competitions.
12. Bloatwares are present but most of them can be uninstalled.
13. No back cover and tamper glass was provided in the box.
14. True 5G experience with 12 bands.
15. Has a dedicated memory card slot along with two sims.
16. Call recording without announcement is present.


Charging Speed Analysis:
1. Samsung 15W charger - Took around 2 hours 30 minutes to full charge from zero.
2. Vooc 18W charger - Took around 2 hours 30 minutes to full charge from zero.
3. Dart 33W charger - Took around 2 hours 10 minutes to full charge from zero.
4. Samsung 25W charger - Took surprisingly around 1 hour 30 minutes to full charge from zero.

In love with this phone. 😍

My first Samsung phone and it's really worth it.
Bgmi Cod Asphalt all are running smoothly on this device.
Made a great choice thanks flipkart.

Everything is good except the charging adaptor and camera quality. Specially the camera is not upto mark. Camera quality is just okay neither too bad nor too good 2.7/5 stars.
Also note that as this model is very new. So back cover is not available in market easily.
F23 photos are not sharp and crisp. Poco was better. I had bought the phone and camera is not good. Xiaomi and poco vivo are offering better camera. You have to make a choice between processor vs camera. If you want camera then don't buy this phone but if you are a gamer then processor is good.

After 2 days of use i am giving this review

Camera is good but not very good.
Display is awesome, couldn't expect that a TFT display can give a awesome experience of video and graphics. And touch is extremely smooth, it is actual 120hz refresh rate.
Battery backup is good.
Though it has mono speaker but sound is clear and loud.
And processor is First enought to play BGMI in HD and High frame rate.
Can play 4k video smoothly.
The only issue is no adaptor inside, but charging cable is there we need to buy a adaptor by our own.

Overall performance is good in this budget. I am happy

First of all, this is a Samsung 2022 5G phone.
Pros:
1. Android 12 with Oneui 4.1 out of the box is extremely good os, feels like a flagship.
2. Call recording without announcement.
3. 5G ready with 12 5G bands
4. Rear camera is very good. Ultra wide cam is also usable.
5. Processor SD 750G is extremely fluid and doesn't throttle or heat up even in summer.
6. Battery 5000mah is just awesome. I charge with Portronics 18W charger which takes less than 2 hr to charge.
7. Display is TFT LCD but believe me, this is very much equivalent to any good IPS screens out there. Very high quality TFT screen used here.
8. 2 year OS update and 4 year security update is good for future.
9. Career aggregation works good. NFC is present.
10. Full fledged Samsung pay is available along with Knox.

Cons:
1. Charger and Back case not included in box.

A good phone in the budget of 15k- 20k with a better processor compared to other phones in this range. Also, refresh rate is higher than other phones in this range. Weaker points are the TFT Display, Front Camera and Drop Notch. Forest Green colour is near to Black colour not making it to look odd but decent.

Overall satisfied with the phone in this price range.

Delivery was on time and the packaging was quiet good.
Good product.Front camera is 8mp but quality is very good.display is very good & 120 hz is so smooth to use..

Very very very good
Best sound
Best camera
Display good
Good looking
Slim and best design
Performance is also good
Superb phone. Blazing fast 750g processor. Great deal in 15999 for 6gb/128gb. I wish if samsung gives charger along with phone. Still its a great phone.

Good Phone I was very confused by Youtubers about Screen and Camera, But after purchase this Turnup the best one.. Good Camera and Good Screen.. So smooth!! 6 Month back I purchased MI 11lite 8 GB +128 and I am completely Not satisfied duw to hang issues and Camera is pathetic!!! I recommend this Phone over MI + Redmi + Realme

This is the best 5g device within 18k budget.

I got the 6 Gb ram variation for 16k. Given the price, it is a very good mobile. Camera is loses sharpness at low light but color accuracy is very good. Daytime snaps are fantastic. Audio quality via headphones is crisp and balanced. Battery lasts easily for 24 hrs, on medium usage. It is a fast phone, and handles normal tasks effortlessly. 2 years android update, which hopefully samsung will deliver. Overall, I think it is a good phone, which can be a good daily driver.
NFC feature is very good ..every thing is good one ui 4.1 is very smooth

Used it for three days. Doesn't heat up, has mediocre camera (my requirements never included it anyway) and has an excellent display. Processing power is strong and I haven't experienced any lags yet. Tried Asphalt; amazing graphics. It actually has a 3.5mm audio jack, which many websites have got wrong. Charger is missing, but it's just another grand. Charging is super fast, and battery life is more than you'd expect from phones in this range.

Just the best product for my dreams. 5g, Dual sim, hours of browsing, fantastic camera, extended memory support, good network capturing, high speed, zero hanging!!
What else one could imagine for this money.. made for India i may say.
Nice phone ,nice design,medium quality,normal screen,in this price performance was best , overall good Samsung phone , happily buy this phone
Overall a good and nice phone , for whom who are looking for a budget phone , performance , battery , camera are very good , value for money

After using this phone for more than a week i can say that it is a good phone for day to day use.
I personally do not game on my phone so not sure on the gaming performance.
The camera quality is okiesh not the best but never the less it's good.
Charging time is fast provided you are using 25w charger.
For the price it's a good phone with knox security and with 2 yrs of Android OS updates and 4 yrs of security updates.

Note: Initially the phone did heat a bit but after updating the software updates from samsung the issue seems to be fixed.

Flipkart delivery is fulfilled as per 2 days commitment.

After 3days usage the phone meets my expectations

bro awesome product . buy it if having a budget <20000. TFT display not an issue. cameras top notch. little bit big screen. processor best. notch is outdated. best design.

This device provides premium user interface and refresh rate is kinda mesmerizing while there is a missing of amoled display. Battery is literally weak and drains quickly eventhough it is in its early stage. I don't know how battery will perform after a couple of months.
Samsung met its audience's expectation of camera without any doubt and I am in love with it. Its camera is way better than that of poco, realme and redmi. Finger print sensor also works pretty well but proximity sensor is not working properly (Hate you Samsung).
The major drawback is no charger, back cover and tempored glass. Back is covered with plastic and back cover is really necessary. Also it lags a little even if it is used less.
In conclusion, purchase this device if you want samsung's brand, good camera and android updation otherwise go for poco.

Device is Real Great for it's price.
Many people have criticized it's display because it's old TFT technology but display is quite good and on par with most of IPS displays.
Main USP of this phone is it's software. Other brands provide a bit better specs at the same price but they lack on UI and software updates. Samsung is better in this case with regular updates.
Samsung pay is really useful and way more faster and convenient to use than any other payment app.
Samsung knox security is huge bonus at this price point.
Samsung one UI works ok. But one ui 4.1 on android 12 is still a bit glitchy. There are some issues which Samsung must address. Sometimes phone hangs while unlocking with fingerprint and takes 5-6 seconds to unlock. Also phone randomly restarts while it's locked.
Overall a great 5g phone at the price point.

Review after 10 days of use:
Pros:-
- Sound quality is very nice, display is decent and works very fast.
- Battery performance is good and charging takes very less time.
Cons:-
- The headphone jack is in bottom side of the smartphone which makes it difficult to hold in hand while using headphones. The headphone jack should be in top.
- The area where the back cameras are mounted, is little outside in compare to back body, which can cause scratches on the camera while placing this smartphone on the rough surface.
- Volume key and power key is on the same side which creates confusion.
- Front camera is very bad. Before clicking the picture, it shows better quality on the screen, but after capturing, it shows in bad quality.
- Speaker is in the bottom side, which gets cover sometimes by hand while holding it, which creates trouble.

Above drawbacks are only in the design, feature wise and quality wise, this smartphone is good.
